DOC.detailed_description: This phase 1 , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled multiple-ascending dose study evaluate safety pharmacokinetics UV-4B oral solution administer healthy subject TID 7 day . Three cohort 8 subject ( 6 active , 2 placebo ) plan 2 additional cohort may add pending safety review initial cohort . Safety review occur cohort . Safety evaluate Day 15 basis adverse event ( AE ) monitoring , clinical laboratory testing ( hematology , serum chemistry , coagulation , urinalysis ) , vital sign , physical examination ( PE ) , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , fecal occult blood test . Blood sample collect specified interval Day 10 pharmacokinetic assessment .
